tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I recently had surgery at Sunrise Hospital under the care of Dr. Nikita Trehan, and I am incredibly grateful for the exceptional treatment I received. Dr. Trehan is confident and highly skilled, and she saved my kidney, essentially saving my life. She dedicated ample time to explain every detail and potential consequence of the surgery, both pre and post-operation, which provided me with great comfort and reassurance.

The staff at Sunrise Hospital were generous and courteous, making my experience as smooth as possible. Their professionalism and kindness were evident throughout my entire stay.

While the charges were higher than anticipated, the quality of care was undoubtedly worth it. Dr. Trehan’s focused and meticulous approach made all the difference. I highly recommend Dr. Nikita Trehan and Sunrise Hospital for anyone seeking top-notch medical care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We have visited sunrise hospital there we met with Dr Nikita Trehan for fibroids which I am facing from last 4 years.She explained all the treatment very satisfactory.
Our surgery has been done by laparoscopically and she is very fine now.Thanks to Dr Nikita trehan and all staff of sunrise hospital..

that was very gud.. we r so thankful to god and by his grace  only and his direction we came here for the treatment .  Dr. Nikita is so confident and so dedicated to her work... thank u so much for ur special care and special attention.. thank u again.. lots of luv...

All she cares about is money. she decided to do my surgery and remove my ovary in 5 minutes of meeting me. she was not interested in knowing any of my medical history. She wanted to do the surgery the next morning itself and freaked me out, instead of pacifying me as she wanted to shell out 5lac from a simple procedure asap. On top of that she came 2hours late and met me only for 5 minutes. she insisted on getting it done the next day itself. it was not a good feeling that a doctor is not trying to comfort the patient but scaring the hell out of me.
I do not recommend this hospital or doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
****** ** ********** **** ** ***** *******. Post surgical she does not even bother to meet her patients. ******* ****** **** ********** ** **** ***** **** ***** ******** ** ******** **** *** **  ******** ***** Bad thing is that she is available only on Saturday and Sunday . No dietician visit and diet chart for the patient. 
 I strongly NOT recommend this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** **** ****** ********** ***** ******** ****** ** ************ ********* *** *********** after the operation is done *** ***** ** ******They dontr even care whether the issue is fixed or not.
Dont even talk properly to patients after getting paid.
i will personally recommend, dont go to this doctor and medical place.

This is the first time I heard about Indian Doctor. Nikita trahen is a gynaecology surgeon and she can help us to reach to our aim,I mean having right treatment and finally to have our own nice child.
cause this is my wife wishes in eight years to have a child by Doctor. trahen's treatment.

Thank you
Staff and Doctor are very good and cooperative. Attended on time. Treated very well. Dr. Nikita is very nice.

Dr. Nikita Trehan was very friendly and polite. Everything was diagnosis and explained properly. Am very happy with the treatment. Staff was very friendly and supportive. Will recommend Dr. Nikita Trehan to others also. Thanks.
...Overall experience was good. Dr Nikita is very kind and nice doctor. Staff was very supportitive ................
